headline: Assessing Albemarle (ALB) Valuation After A Sharp Share Price Rebound
summary: Why Albemarle (ALB) is on investors’ radar now Albemarle (ALB) has drawn fresh attention after a stretch of mixed share performance, including a gain over the past month and past 3 months. This has prompted investors to reassess its value and earnings profile. See our latest analysis for Albemarle. The 1 day share price return of 5.83% and 30 day share price return of 18.28% sit within a broader 90 day share price return of 89.04%, while the 1 year total shareholder return of 87.26% contrasts...

headline: How Investors May Respond To Albemarle (ALB) After HSBC Upgrade And Stronger Balance Sheet Focus
summary: Earlier this week, HSBC upgraded Albemarle, highlighting expectations of tighter lithium supply and improved company fundamentals including stronger free cash flow and a healthier balance sheet. The bank also pointed to Albemarle’s recent capital raising and operational efficiency efforts as key factors enhancing its leverage in upcoming lithium contract negotiations. Next, we’ll examine how HSBC’s focus on Albemarle’s bolstered balance sheet and lithium market backdrop shapes the company’s...

headline: Market Movers: Albemarle Exploding on Lithium Supply-Demand Story
summary: With the lithium supply-demand story heating up again, Albemarle (NYSE: ALB) is still exploding higher. In fact, since Friday, ALB ran from about $162 to $179 and could see higher highs. Helping, Deutsche Bank upgraded ALB to a buy rating with a $185 price target. Analysts at Baird also upgraded ALB to a buy with ... Market Movers: Albemarle Exploding on Lithium Supply-Demand Story

headline: AREC Achieves Production of Greater Than 99.9% Pure Samarium
summary: AREC-backed ReElement produces over 99.9% pure samarium, meeting magnet-grade specs as demand surges amid supply disruptions.

headline: BASF to Feature Sustainable Plastics Solutions at PlastIndia 2026
summary: BASFY heads to PlastIndia 2026 to showcase sustainable plastics across Make, Use and Recycle, spotlighting circularity, innovation and high performance.

headline: Albemarle Stock Rises on Another Upgrade. Higher Lithium Prices Are Driving Shares.
summary: Truist analyst Peter Osterland upgraded shares of the lithium miner to Buy from Hold. His price target went to $205 from $125. Higher lithium prices drove the change.

raw.headline: Albemarle Stock Rises on Another Upgrade. Higher Lithium Prices Are Driving Shares.
